description: The White Wine Mojito is an intoxicating twist on the&nbsp;traditional cocktail. Using your favorite&nbsp;white wine instead of&nbsp;rum, you can quickly and easily enjoy this drink with less fuss than usual.This best wine cocktail is great for intimate gatherings with family or friends. Mojitos are also incredibly popular, but if you're looking for something different to serve at your next get-together—try out this version!
name: White Wine Mojito
